title: Entity
description: An object that describes a piece of software for the current blueprint

id.title: Entity ID
id.description: An ID string, used to refer to this service

name.title: Entity name
name.description: A human readable name, to be displayed in the GUI or CLI at runtime

type.title: Entity type
type.description: A reference to the the of this entity. Can be either another entity ID or a full java class name

brooklyn.config.title: Entity configuration
brooklyn.config.description: Configuration key-value pairs passed to the service entity being created

brooklyn.children.title: Entity children
brooklyn.children.description: A list of entities which will be configured as children of this entity

brooklyn.policies.title: Policies
brooklyn.policies.description: A list of policies, each as a map described with their type and their brooklyn.config as keys

brooklyn.enrichers.title: Enrichers
brooklyn.enrichers.description: A list of enrichers, each as a map described with their type and their brooklyn.config as keys

brooklyn.initializers.title: Initializers
brooklyn.initializers.description: A list of initializers instances to be constructed and run against the entity, each as a map described with their type and their brooklyn.config as keys

brooklyn.parameters.title: Parameters
brooklyn.parameters.description: A list of typed parameters the entity accepts

name.title: Parameter name
name.description: Identifier by which to reference the parameter when setting or retrieving its value

label.title: Parameter label
label.description: A value to present to the user, same as name if empty

description.title: Parameter description
description.description: Short text describing the parameter behaviour/usage, presented to the user

type.title: Parameter type
type.description: The type of the parameter, one of string, boolean, integer, long, float, double, timestamp, duration, port, or a fully qualified Java type name; the default is string

default.title: Parameter default value
default.description: A default value; this will be coerced to the declared type

pinned.title: Parameter is pinned?
pinned.description: Mark the parameter as pinned (always displayed) for the UI. The default is true

reconfigurable.title: Parameter is reconfigurable?
reconfigurable.description: Determines whether the parameter can be reconfigured. The default is false

constraints.title: Parameter constraints
constraints.description: A list of constraints the parameter should meet

constraintRequired.title: Constraint required
constraintRequired.description: Deployment will fail if no value is supplied for this config key

constraintRegex.title: Constraint regex
constraintRegex.description: Deployment will fail if no value is supplied for this config key

constraintPredicate.title: Constraint predicate
constraintPredicate.description: A predicate, declared using the DSL $brooklyn:object
